title: Train Fault Causing Delays on East West Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东区线列车故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan Kereta Api Menyebabkan Kelewatan di Laluan Timur Barat
title_translations.ta: கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் ரயில் பழுது

updates.text: [EWL] UPDATE: Fault is cleared. Expect longer travelling time from  #TiongBahru towards #PasirRis. Trains and platforms are crowded.
[EWL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #TiongBahru to #OutramPark towards PasirRis due to train fault.
